instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But revelations about the nuclear weapons smuggling network organized by A. Q. Khan, the father of Pakistan's bomb, confirm the danger I predicted back then.
output: Pourtant les révélations sur le réseau de trafiquants d'armes nucléaires organisé par A. Q. Khan, le père de la bombe atomique pakistanaise, confirment les dangers que j'exposais à cette époque-là.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: High fertility rates in many countries are partly a consequence of low income.
output: Les taux élevés de fécondité de nombreux pays sont en partie la conséquence de faibles revenus.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: And, most audaciously of all, the European Union introduced the euro as a common currency.
output: Mesure plus audacieuse encore, l'Union européenne a introduit l'euro comme monnaie commune.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: These imbalances can be redressed only with great effort, if at all, and only if one accepts a decade of stagnation.
output: Ces déséquilibres peuvent être redressés à la seule condition de fournir de gros efforts – et encore – et uniquement à condition de se résigner à dix années de stagnation.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: The single most immediate and direct impact of having an independent fiscal policy would be to reign in spending by producing a counterpoint to Panglossian government growth and revenue forecasts.
output: L’impact le plus immédiat et le plus direct de disposer d’une politique fiscale indépendante serait de maîtriser les dépenses en s’opposant aux prévisions de croissance et de revenu fiscal développées par les gouvernements insouciants.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Serbia is prepared to concede only “enhanced autonomy” to Kosovo, and some capacity to enter into international agreements.
output: La Serbie est prête à ne concéder qu’une « autonomie élargie » au Kosovo, et une capacité restreinte à négocier des accords internationaux.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: A Clockwork Orange was accused of glorifying violence, and some of its scenes are still hard to watch.
output: Le film Orange mécanique a été accusé de faire l’apologie de la violence et certaines de ses scènes restent assez insoutenables.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Meanwhile, the Bush Administration will blame the sinking economy, bad luck, and unintentional miscalculations for the vanished surplus.
output: Pendant ce temps, le gouvernement Bush attribuera ces fonds disparus à la mauvaise santé économique, au manque de chance et aux mauvais calculs involontaires.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But few saw, for instance, the Artic ice cap melting as rapidly as now seems to be the case.
output: Toutefois, peu avaient notamment prédit que la calotte glaciaire de l’Arctique fonderait aussi vite qu’à l’heure actuelle, manifestement.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: For the world as a whole, it is a desirable goal.
output: Pour le monde dans son ensemble, elle représente un objectif souhaitable.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But it must not blind central banks and governments to the full range of policy tools available to address today’s severe debt overhangs.
output: Mais elle ne doit pas aveugler les banques centrales et les gouvernements quant à la gamme complète d'outils politiques disponibles pour répondre aux graves problèmes de surendettement d'aujourd'hui.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: The pace of change will vary between sectors and across economies, leading to mismatches of demand and supply worldwide.
output: Le rythme du changement est voué à varier selon les secteurs et entre les économies, conduisant à une inadéquation de l’offre et de la demande à l’échelle mondiale.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: It is too much to expect that these new fiscal institutions will become as important or powerful as central banks, at least anytime soon.
output: On ne peut probablement pas attendre que ces nouvelles institutions fiscales deviennent aussi importantes ou puissantes que les banques centrales, au moins dans un avenir proche.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In other words, if your trust in the market and in the way it is regulated fell sharply, you were less likely to deposit money in banks or invest in stocks.
output: Autrement dit, si vous n'avez plus confiance dans le marché et dans sa régulation, vous n'allez peut-être pas déposer de l'argent dans une banque ou investir à la Bourse.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Neuroscientists have even magnetically “zapped” carefully targeted areas of people’s brains to influence their moral judgments in surprising ways – for example, making it easier for them to lie.
output: Les neurologues sont également parvenus, au moyen de stimulations magnétiques transcraniennes soigneusement ciblées, d’influer de manière surprenante sur les jugements moraux de patients – en leur permettant par exemple de mentir plus facilement.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Changing constitutions is always a risky business.
output: Changer la constitution est toujours une entreprise hasardeuse.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: BERKELEY – To solve a problem, it is not enough to know what to do.
output: BERKELEY – Pour résoudre un problème, il ne suffit pas de savoir quoi faire.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Ten of 21 branches of Dutch agribusiness, including horticultural seeds, ornamentals, seed potatoes, and veal, are among the top contributors to the national economy and the country’s trade balance.
output: 10 des 21 branches de l’agrobusiness néerlandais, dont les semences horticoles, les ornemantales, graines de pommes de terre et le veau, sont parmi les meilleurs acteurs de l’économie nationale et de la balance commerciale du pays.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But it is also a distant goal. Indeed, population decline in the advanced countries remains far less of a problem than rapid population growth in many developing countries.
output: Or, nous en sommes encore loin\xa0: le déclin de la population dans les pays avancés reste un problème beaucoup moins sérieux que la croissance rapide de la population dans de nombreux pays en développement.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But science might also offer more direct ways of influencing our brains.
output: Mais la science pourrait également permettre d’influer sur nos cerveaux de manière plus directe.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: So, yes, there are solid fundamentals that arguably support today’s higher gold price, although it is far more debatable whether and to what extent they will continue to support higher prices in the future.
output: Il y a donc de solides fondamentaux qui expliquent sans doute le cours élevé actuel de l’or, mais la question de savoir s’ils continueront à soutenir le cours à l’avenir, et dans quelle mesure, reste posée.
